meanings.definition: Capable of being shifted or moved.
meanings.sent1: The boxes were shiftable, so we could rearrange them easily.
meanings.sent2: The furniture in the room was shiftable, allowing for different layouts.
meanings.sent3: The shiftable chairs made the classroom look like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were as shiftable as sand, constantly changing direction.
meanings.sent5: The clouds in the sky seemed shiftable, floating effortlessly with the wind.

meanings.definition: Able to be changed or adjusted.
meanings.sent1: The schedule was shiftable, accommodating unexpected events.
meanings.sent2: His attitude was shiftable, depending on the situation.
meanings.sent3: The shiftable plans kept us on our toes, never knowing what would happen next.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were as shiftable as the weather, unpredictable and ever-changing.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the chameleon were shiftable, blending seamlessly with its surroundings.

meanings.definition: Designed to be easily moved or rearranged.
meanings.sent1: The shiftable shelves allowed for quick organization changes.
meanings.sent2: The shiftable stage set made transitions between scenes smooth.
meanings.sent3: The shiftable office layout was like a game of musical chairs, but with desks.
meanings.sent4: His plans were as shiftable as a Rubik's Cube, always twisting into new shapes.
meanings.sent5: The shiftable walls in the exhibit transformed the space into different environments.
